name: Nidhu B Kapoor
who_you_serve: WhatsApp serves over 3 billion users globally, including individuals and families looking to communicate easily and securely.
what_you_do: WhatsApp is a messaging application that allows users to send text messages, make voice and video calls, and share various media types securely and reliably.
